statements: DELETE FROM delivery_vehicle_movement WHERE zone_id = 5 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM delivery_vehicle_movement WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND zone_id = 10;
DELETE FROM delivery_vehicle_movement WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
